titles.title: A resolution making minority party appointments for certain committees for the 111th Congress.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
Senate Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation

bill.summary: 9/22/2009--Reported to Senate without amendment. Makes minority party appointments to the following Senate Committees for the 111th Congress: (1) Armed Services; (2) Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs; (3) Commerce, Science, and Transportation; and (4) Aging.
